actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1673 (c) of title 38, United States Code, to permit under certain circumstances, the payment of an educational assistance allowance to an eligible veteran who pursues a bar review course conducted by telephone or closed circuit television.

summary.text: Permits the payment of an educational assistance allowance to an eligible veteran who pursues a bar review course conducted by telephone or closed circuit television if his attendance at such sessions is checked and certified by the Veterans' Administration. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1673(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1673 (c) of title 38, United States Code, to permit under certain circumstances, the payment of an educational assistance allowance to an eligible veteran who pursues a bar review course conducted by telephone or closed circuit television.
